news.description: President Obama says 'Adios!' in last 'Three Amigos' summitPresident Obama will travel to Canada on Wednesday for his last North American Leaders’ Summit, also known as the "Three Amigos" summit, where he will meet with Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.
news.title: 5 things you need to know Wednesday

news.description: Ribuan tambang tutup di Indonesia karena harga batubara masih anjlok.
news.title: Harga Batubara Masih Anjlok, Indonesia Hadapi Bom Waktu Lingkungan Hidup

news.description: The Barr government is now threatening voters with a $220–$280 million cost for scrapping light rail ("Trams ordered, cancellation cost $220m", June 28, p1). Instead of selling the "apparent" $1.2 billion in benefits, the ACT government has decided to run a scare campaign for stopping the project.
news.title: 220m scare tactic

news.description: Rennell Island in the Renbell province records the lowest temperature in the country’s history of 17 degree Celsius few weeks ago. This was revealed by a meteorology officer during the commissioning of the weather station in Tingoa last week.
news.title: Rennell record lowest temperature

news.description: Letters to the EditorThe Barr government is now threatening voters with a $220–$280 million cost for scrapping light rail ("Trams ordered, cancellation cost $220m", June 28, p1). Instead of selling the "apparent" $1.2 billion in benefits, the ACT government has decided to run a scare campaign for stopping the project.
news.title: 220m scare tactic

news.description: Bisnis.com, SURABAYA – Prakirawan pada Badan Meteorologi Kilomatologi dan Geofisika (BMKG) Maritim Tanjung Perak Surabaya Eko Prasetyo mengingatkan operator transportasi agar mewaspadai potensi cuaca tidak kondusif karena gelombang tinggi dan guyuran hujan pada masa angkutan Lebaran.
news.title: BMKG: Operator Transportasi Agar Waspadai Potensi Cuaca
